title: New: imugi – Dizzy
content:
Love this vaguely Basquiat-esque artwork from New Zealand newcomer imugi, for her debut track, Dizzy.

Part FKA Twigs, part BANKS, with more synth-pop tendencies, what it perhaps lacks in high quality production, it more than makes up for in energy and a simplistic yet bloody brilliant chorus – oh and that solo. Definitely intrigued to see how imugi progresses from here. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
